name: KISS digital
tagline: We help companies reach their digital goals
description:
At KISS digital, we create web & mobile apps from A to Z, working closely with our clients every step of the way.
Our team of developers, designers and communication specialists is on a mission to provide winning technological and communication solutions for both emerging startups and large enterprises from various industries.

We also have experience in connecting digital and physical worlds, including IoT applications and the use of Bluetooth Low Energy technology.
